title: Microplastics in the Volta Lake: Occurrence, distribution, and human health implications
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Charles Mario Boateng, Samuel Addo, Collins Prah Duodu, Harriet Danso-Abbeam, Prince Chapman Agyeman, Kofi Ferni Anyan, Eunice Konadu Asamoah, Emmanuel Robert Blankson, Elvis Nyarko, Atsushi Matsuoka
